column3:
I'm not sure it makes much sense to document this flag. It's never useful to end users, so it's a waste of translator time.

(At the very least we don't want to add new translation messages until the 0.11 release)
On the other hand this is only shown with `-help-debug`.\nAlternatively, we could add the policy that debug option help messages are not translated (no `_()`), then I'm fine with this.\n
@laanwj Currently all debug help messages are translated anyway. So to be consistent we could just merge as is or I add another commit, which removes the translation for all `-help-debug` strings?\n

I don't want to remove the existing strings for 0.11, people may have already translated them (a string freeze is a string freeze). At least do not translate this one and add a comment to not add new translation strings for strings that will only be visible to developers.\n

@laanwj Sorry, but as I use `-help-debug` all time with german translation turned on, I refuse to leave this translation string out, while ALL others are indeed translated, that makes no sense to me.\n
